description: Protect Your Kindle Fire HD 8.9 Tablet (2012 Release), with i-Blason Bubble Free Screen protector!i-Blason Anti-Glare Screen Protectorsprovide the highest transparency while still delivering scratch resistant protection for your Kindle Fire HD 8.9 tablet with amazing patent pending bubble free technology which enables you to apply the screen protectors in seconds!WARING: THIS SCREEN PROTECTOR IS FOR THE KINDLE FIRE HD 8.9 INCH TABLET (2012 RELEASE) AND WILL NOT BE COMPATIBLE WITH: NEW KINDLE FIRE HD 7 INCH TABLET (2013 RELEASE), KINDLE FIRE HDX 7, KINDLE FIRE HDX 8.9, KINDLE FIRE OR KINDLE FIRE HD 7 (2012 RELEASE) TABLETSMisalignment? No Worries. Just remove the bubble free screen protector, realign and reapply. You are good to go. Just as simple as that.All i-Blason Screen protectors are made of the highest quality Japanese PET Film available with 100% Bubble-Free Silicon Adhesives.Every i-Blason Screen Protector is backed by thei-BLASON ONE YEAR REPLACEMENT WARRANTY!The i-Blason Screen Protector Kit Includes:- One i-Blason HD Anti-Glare Bubble Free Screen Protector- Installation Instructions- Microfiber Polishing Cloth- Bubble Removal Tape- Retail Packagingi-BLASON ONE YEAR REPLACEMENT WARRANTYWe are committed to your satisfaction and will send you replacements free of charge for:- Installation Problems such as bubbles or other user error- Scratched or damaged screen protectors- Wear and TearOur commitment to you is that we will keep your device protected, i-Blason Bubble Free Guaranteed, or your money back.
